idea: LEAP India provides packaging and movement solutions to reduce overall logistics cost across business verticals. The solutions are based on pooling of assets such as Wooden Pallets, Plastic Foldable containers, Plastic Crates, Plastic totes. Since commencement of operations in 2014 LEAP has acquired over 400 customers and is the market leader in pooled Pallets in India. Pooling as concert helps reduce the carbon imprint by cross utilization of assets by multiple users thus bring down the overall cost of operations for the pool participants.
name: LEAP INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
